<Funeral Dinner Preparations>

<Pyotr Petrovitch, irritated, plotting, curious>
<His mind races with ideas.>
Pyotr Petrovitch: “They'll regret this! I’m too generous!”  

Pyotr Petrovitch: “How can they dismiss me?”  

Pyotr Petrovitch: “Fools! They’ll feel guilty soon enough!”  

---

<In the dining area, Amalia is busy.>

<Preparations in full swing, tension rising.>
Madame Lippevechsel: “Everyone’s invited, even him!”  

Pyotr Petrovitch: “I’m the most important here!”  

Amalia Ivanovna: “This will be a grand affair!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pyotr Petrovitch feels frustrated and irritated by various personal and social obligations, particularly regarding a funeral dinner he is expected to attend.
